atk-abh03a45:2_0: 1. Idāni tesaññeva mūlayamake desitānaṁ kusalādidhammānaṁ labbhamānavasena ekadesaṁ
atk-abh03a45:2_1: saṅgaṇhitvā saccayamakānantaraṁ desitassa saṅkhārayamakassa vaṇṇanā hoti. Tatthāpi
atk-abh03a45:2_2: heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva paṇṇattivārādayo tayo mahāvārā, antaravārādayo ca avasesapabhedā
atk-abh03a45:2_3: veditabbā. Ayaṁ panettha viseso – paṇṇattivāre tāva yathā heṭṭhā khandhādayo dhamme
atk-abh03a45:2_4: uddisitvā “rūpaṁ rūpakkhandho; cakkhu cakkhāyatanaṁ; cakkhu cakkhudhātu; dukkhaṁ
atk-abh03a45:2_5: dukkhasacca”nti padasodhanavāro āraddho. Tathā anārabhitvā “assāsapassāsā kāyasaṅkhāro”ti
atk-abh03a45:3_0: Tattha kāyassa saṅkhāro kāyasaṅkhāro. “Assāsapassāsā kāyikā, ete dhammā kāyappaṭibaddhā”ti
atk-abh03a45:3_1: hi vacanato kāraṇabhūtassa karajakāyassa phalabhūto eva saṅkhāroti kāyasaṅkhāro.
atk-abh03a45:3_2: Aparo nayo – saṅkhariyatīti saṅkhāro. Kena saṅkhariyatīti? Kāyena. Ayañhi vāto viya
atk-abh03a45:3_3: bhastāya karajakāyena saṅkhariyatīti. Evampi kāyassa saṅkhāroti kāyasaṅkhāro. Kāyena
atk-abh03a45:3_4: kato assāsapassāsavātoti attho. “Pubbeva kho, āvuso visākha, vitakketvā vicāretvā
atk-abh03a45:3_5: pacchā vācaṁ bhindati, tasmā vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhāro”ti vacanato pana saṅkharotīti
atk-abh03a45:3_6: saṅkhāro. Kiṁ saṅkharoti? Vaciṁ. Vaciyā saṅkhāroti vacīsaṅkhāro. Vacībhedasamuṭṭhāpakassa
atk-abh03a45:3_7: vitakkavicāradvayassetaṁ nāmaṁ. “Saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittapaṭibaddhā”ti
atk-abh03a45:3_8: vacanatoyeva pana tatiyapadepi saṅkhariyatīti saṅkhāro. Kena saṅkhariyati? Cittena.
atk-abh03a45:3_9: Karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṁ katvā cittassa saṅkhāroti cittasaṅkhāro. Sabbesampi cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ
atk-abh03a45:3_10: cetasikadhammānametaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Vitakkavicārānaṁ pana vacīsaṅkhārabhāvena visuṁ
atk-abh03a45:4_0: 2-7. Idāni kāyo kāyasaṅkhāroti padasodhanavāro āraddho. Tassa anulomanaye tīṇi, paṭilomanaye
atk-abh03a45:4_1: tīṇīti cha yamakāni. Padasodhanamūlacakkavāre ekekasaṅkhāramūlakāni dve dve katvā
atk-abh03a45:4_2: anulomanaye cha, paṭilomanaye chāti dvādasa yamakāni. Suddhasaṅkhāravāre pana yathā
atk-abh03a45:4_3: suddhakhandhavārādīsu “rūpaṁ khandho, khandhā rūpaṁ; cakkhu āyatanaṁ, āyatanā cakkhū”tiādinā
atk-abh03a45:4_4: nayena yamakāni vuttāni. Evaṁ “kāyo saṅkhāro, saṅkhārā kāyo”ti avatvā “kāyasaṅkhāro
atk-abh03a45:4_5: vacīsaṅkhāro, vacīsaṅkhāro kāyasaṅkhāro”tiādinā nayena kāyasaṅkhāramūlakāni dve,
atk-abh03a45:4_6: vacīsaṅkhāramūlakaṁ ekanti anulome tīṇi, paṭilome tīṇīti sabbānipi suddhikavāre cha
atk-abh03a45:4_7: yamakāni vuttāni. Kiṁ kāraṇā? Suddhikaekekapadavasena atthābhāvato. Yathā hi khandhayamakādīsu
atk-abh03a45:4_9: khandho, khandhā rūpaṁ, cakkhu āyatanaṁ, āyatanā cakkhū”ti suddhikaekekapadavasena
atk-abh03a45:4_10: attho atthi. Evamidha “kāyo saṅkhāro, saṅkhārā kāyo”ti natthi. Kāyasaṅkhāroti pana
atk-abh03a45:4_11: dvīhipi padehi ekova attho labbhati. Assāso vā passāso vāti suddhikaekekapadavasena
atk-abh03a45:4_12: atthābhāvato “kāyo saṅkhāro, saṅkhārā kāyo”ti na vuttaṁ. “Kāyo kāyasaṅkhāro”tiādi
atk-abh03a45:4_13: pana vattabbaṁ siyā. Tampi kāyavacīcittapadehi idha adhippetānaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ aggahitattā
atk-abh03a45:4_14: na yujjati. Suddhasaṅkhāravāro hesa. Padasodhane pana vināpi atthena vacanaṁ yujjatīti
atk-abh03a45:4_15: tattha so nayo gahitova. Idha pana kāyasaṅkhārassa vacīsaṅkhārādīhi, vacīsaṅkhārassa
atk-abh03a45:4_16: ca cittasaṅkhārādīhi, cittasaṅkhārassa ca kāyasaṅkhārādīhi, aññattā “kāyasaṅkhāro
atk-abh03a45:4_17: vacīsaṅkhāro, vacīsaṅkhāro, kāyasaṅkhāro”ti ekekasaṅkhāramūlakāni dve dve katvā cha
atk-abh03a45:4_18: yamakāni yujjanti. Tesu aggahitaggahaṇena tīṇeva labbhanti. Tasmā tāneva dassetuṁ
atk-abh03a45:4_19: anulomanaye tīṇi, paṭilomanaye tīṇīti cha yamakāni vuttāni. Suddhasaṅkhāramūlacakkavāro
atk-abh03a45:4_20: panettha na gahitoti. Evaṁ paṇṇattivārassa uddesavāro veditabbo.
atk-abh03a45:5_0: 8-18. Niddesavāre panassa anulome tāva yasmā na kāyādayova kāyasaṅkhārādīnaṁ nāmaṁ,
atk-abh03a45:5_1: tasmā noti paṭisedho kato. Paṭilome na kāyo na kāyasaṅkhāroti yo na kāyo so kāyasaṅkhāropi
atk-abh03a45:5_2: na hotīti pucchati. Kāyasaṅkhāro na kāyo kāyasaṅkhāroti kāyasaṅkhāro kāyo na hoti,
atk-abh03a45:5_3: kāyasaṅkhāroyeva panesoti attho. Avasesanti na kevalaṁ sesasaṅkhāradvayameva. Kāyasaṅkhāravinimuttaṁ
atk-abh03a45:5_4: pana sesaṁ sabbampi saṅkhatāsaṅkhatapaṇṇattibhedaṁ dhammajātaṁ neva kāyo, na kāyasaṅkhāroti
atk-abh03a45:8_0: 19. Pavattivāre panettha paccuppannakāle puggalavārassa anulomanaye “yassa kāyasaṅkhāro
atk-abh03a45:8_1: uppajjati, tassa vacīsaṅkhāro uppajjatī”ti kāyasaṅkhāramūlakāni dve, vacīsaṅkhāramūlakaṁ
atk-abh03a45:8_2: ekanti tīṇeva yamakāni labbhanti; tāni gahitāneva. Tassa paṭilomanayepi okāsavārādīsupi
atk-abh03a45:8_3: eseva nayo. Evamettha sabbavāresu tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ yamakānaṁ vasena yamakagaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a45:9_0: Atthavinicchaye panettha idaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ – imasmiñhi saṅkhārayamake “assāsapassāsānaṁ
atk-abh03a45:9_2: gahetabbo, na cutipaṭisandhivaseneva. “Dutiyajjhāne tatiyajjhāne tattha kāyasaṅkhāro
atk-abh03a45:9_3: uppajjatī”tiādivacanato ca jhānampi okāsavasena gahitanti veditabbaṁ. Evamettha yaṁ
atk-abh03a45:9_4: yaṁ labbhati, tassa tassa vasena atthavinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a45:10_0: Tatridaṁ nayamukhaṁ – vinā vitakkavicārehīti dutiyatatiyajjhānavasena vuttaṁ. Tesanti
atk-abh03a45:10_1: tesaṁ dutiyatatiyajjhānasamaṅgīnaṁ. Kāmāvacarānanti kāmāvacare uppannasattānaṁ. Rūpāvacaradevānaṁ
atk-abh03a45:10_2: pana assāsapassāsā natthi. Arūpāvacarānaṁ rūpameva natthi. Vinā assāsapassāsehīti
atk-abh03a45:11_1: cettha paṭhamajjhānaṁ gahetabbaṁ, na appanāvaseneva. Anappanāpattepi hi savitakkasavicāracitte
atk-abh03a45:12: 24.Cittassabhaṅgakkhaṇeti idaṁ kāyasaṅkhārassa ekantacittasamuṭṭhānattā vuttaṁ. Uppajjamānameva hi cittaṁ rūpaṁ vā arūpaṁ vā samuṭṭhāpeti, na bhijjamānaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:13_0: 37.Suddhāvāsānaṁ dutiye citte vattamāneti paṭisandhito dutiye bhavaṅgacitte. Kāmañcetaṁ
atk-abh03a45:13_1: paṭisandhicittepi vattamāne tesaṁ tattha nuppajjittheva. Yāva pana abbokiṇṇaṁ vipākacittaṁ
atk-abh03a45:13_2: vattati, tāva nuppajjittheva nāmāti dassanatthametaṁ vuttaṁ. Yassa vā jhānassa vipākacittena
atk-abh03a45:13_3: te nibbattā, taṁ satasopi sahassasopi uppajjamānaṁ paṭhamacittameva. Vipākacittena
atk-abh03a45:13_4: pana visadisaṁ bhavanikantiyā āvajjanacittaṁ dutiyacittaṁ nāma. Taṁ sandhāyetaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:14_2: arūpāvacarānañca catutthajjhānikacuticittavasenetaṁ vuttaṁ. Tesanti tesaṁ pacchimacittasamaṅgīādīnaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:15_0: 79.Yassa kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhati, tassa cittasaṅkhāro nirujjhatīti ettha niyamato
atk-abh03a45:15_1: kāyasaṅkhārassa cittasaṅkhārena saddhiṁ ekakkhaṇe nirujjhanato āmantāti paṭivacanaṁ
atk-abh03a45:15_2: dinnaṁ. Na cittasaṅkhārassa kāyasaṅkhārena saddhiṁ. Kiṁ kāraṇā? Cittasaṅkhāro hi
atk-abh03a45:15_3: kāyasaṅkhārena vināpi uppajjati ca nirujjhati ca. Kāyasaṅkhāro pana cittasamuṭṭhāno
atk-abh03a45:15_4: assāsapassāsavāto. Cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañca cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppajjitvā yāva aññāni
atk-abh03a45:15_5: soḷasacittāni uppajjanti, tāva tiṭṭhati. Tesaṁ soḷasannaṁ sabbapacchimena saddhiṁ
atk-abh03a45:15_6: nirujjhatīti yena cittena saddhiṁ uppajjati, tato paṭṭhāya sattarasamena saddhiṁ
atk-abh03a45:15_7: nirujjhati. Na kassaci cittassa uppādakkhaṇe vā ṭhitikkhaṇe vā nirujjhati, nāpi ṭhitikkhaṇe
atk-abh03a45:15_8: vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā uppajjati. Esā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa dhammatāti niyamato cittasaṅkhārena
atk-abh03a45:15_9: saddhiṁ ekakkhaṇe nirujjhanato āmantāti vuttaṁ. Yaṁ pana vibhaṅgappakaraṇassa sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyaṁ
atk-abh03a45:15_10: “cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ sattarasamassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirujjhatī”ti vuttaṁ,
atk-abh03a45:15_11: taṁ imāya pāḷiyā virūjjhati. Aṭṭhakathāto ca pāḷiyeva balavatarāti pāḷiyaṁ vuttameva pamāṇaṁ.
atk-abh03a45:16_0: 128.Yassa kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjati, tassa vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhatīti ettha yasmā kāyasaṅkhāro
atk-abh03a45:16_1: cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppajjati, na ca tasmiṁ khaṇe vitakkavicārā nirujjhanti, tasmā
atk-abh03a45:16_2: noti paṭisedho katoti. Iminā nayamukhena sabbattha atthavinicchayo veditabbo. Pariññāvāro pākatikoyevāti.
